001package com.technototes.library.command;
002
003import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
004
005/**
006 * @author Alex Stedman
007 * class for commands with time to run
008 */
009public class WaitCommand implements Command {
010    public double getSeconds() {
011        return supplier.getAsDouble();
012    }
013
014    private DoubleSupplier supplier;
015
016    public WaitCommand(double sec) {
017        supplier = () -> sec;
018    }
019
020    public WaitCommand(DoubleSupplier sup) {
021        supplier = sup;
022    }
023
024    @Override
025    public void execute() {}
026
027    @Override
028    public boolean isFinished() {
029        return supplier.getAsDouble() <= getRuntime().seconds();
030    }
031}
